snippet: Lin Dakang is one of thousands of food delivery workers who zoom around Manhattan on bicycles, drawing little notice except from those who view them as an urban menace.
abstract: Lin Dakang is one of thousands of food delivery workers who zoom around Manhattan on bicycles, ubiquitous but drawing little notice except from those who view them as an urban menace; delivery workers face daily physical strain and danger, low wages, bicycle thefts and a system that offers them little protection.
lead_paragraph: Lin Dakang is one of thousands of food delivery workers who zoom around Manhattan on bicycles, drawing little notice except from those who view them as an urban menace.

headline.seo: For Food Delivery Workers, Speed, Tips and Fear on Wheels
headline.main: For Deliverymen, Speed, Tips and Fear on Wheels
headline.print_headline: Speed, Tips And Fear on Wheels
